comment: * Implementation of {@link XPathFactory#newInstance(String)}. * * @author Kohsuke Kawaguchi * @version $Revision: 670432 $, $Date: 2008-06-22 19:02:08 -0700 (Sun, 22 Jun 2008) $ * @since 1.5

methods.name: public XPathFactory newFactory(String uri)
methods.comment:
*

Creates a new {@link XPathFactory} object for the specified * schema language.

* * @param uri * Identifies the underlying object model. * * @return null if the callee fails to create one. * * @throws NullPointerException * If the parameter is null.

methods.name: private XPathFactory _newFactory(String uri)
methods.comment:
*

Lookup a {@link XPathFactory} for the given object model.

* * @param uri identifies the object model.

methods.name: XPathFactory createInstance(String className)
methods.comment:
*

Creates an instance of the specified and returns it.

* * @param className * fully qualified class name to be instantiated. * * @return null * if it fails. Error messages will be printed by this method.

methods.name: private XPathFactory loadFromServicesFile(String uri, String resourceName, InputStream in)
methods.comment: Searches for a XPathFactory for a given uri in a META-INF/services file.

methods.name: private Iterable<URL> createServiceFileIterator()
methods.comment:
* Returns an {@link Iterator} that enumerates all
     * the META-INF/services files that we care.

methods.name: private static String which(String classname, ClassLoader loader)
methods.comment:
*

Search the specified classloader for the given classname.

* * @param classname the fully qualified name of the class to search for * @param loader the classloader to search * * @return the source location of the resource, or null if it wasn't found

methodNames: private XPathFactory loadFromServicesFile(String uri, String resourceName, InputStream in)
private static String which(String classname, ClassLoader loader)
